Key Match Events: The Dallas Mavericks suffered their third straight loss, falling 110-99 to the Houston Rockets.
Houston Rockets took control of the game with a 13-0 run in the middle of the second quarter.
The Mavericks turned the ball over 20 times, leading to 22 points for the Rockets.
Dereck Lively II returned after missing three games and had eight points, six rebounds, six assists, four blocks, and four fouls in 20 minutes.
